sentences.sContent: Your wedding ring can be engraved with a personal inscription at no extra cost.
sentences.sCn: 你的结婚戒指可以刻上个人题字不另收费。

sentences.sContent: The shop will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentences.sCn: 商店也将在一侧刻上你孩子的名字。

words.tran: 被牢记的；被深深印入的
在…上雕刻；给…深刻的印象（engrave的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 雕刻， 铭刻； 牢记， 铭记
trans.tranOther: If you engrave something with a design or words, or if you engrave a design or words on it, you cut the design or words into its surface
